author: pipermerriam
content: I propose merging <#796057759858425866> <#688086042959806497> <#806927594092101642> into a single channel #portal-network by renaming <#796057759858425866>.  Speak up if you object.  i'll do this sometime next week if there are no strong objections.

author: pipermerriam
content: This approach is quite interesting, though it inherently relies on centralized resources which certainly makes things complex for broad adoption.
